LanguageData.ChildSpy47.baseDesc: Children are presumed innocent, which makes them excellent spies. [PAWN_nameDef] was trained in the art of infiltration when [PAWN_pronoun] was just a small child.\n\n[PAWN_possessive] years undercover gave [PAWN_objective] experience with social manipulation and lying, but [PAWN_pronoun] never had a normal education.
LanguageData.ChildSpy47.title: 어린 스파이
LanguageData.ChildStar74.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was well-known throughout [PAWN_possessive] homeworld as a child actor in films and TV shows. [PAWN_possessive] fame put [PAWN_objective] in contact with many different kinds of people, but also tended to get in the way of [PAWN_possessive] education.
LanguageData.ChildStar74.title: 어린 스타
LanguageData.ComaChild93.baseDesc: A childhood accident put [PAWN_nameDef] into a coma. [PAWN_pronoun] didn't wake up until [PAWN_pronoun] was in [PAWN_possessive] late teens. [PAWN_possessive] body never recovered from the years of inactivity, but people tend to take pity on [PAWN_objective] when they hear [PAWN_possessive] story.
LanguageData.ComaChild93.title: 사격천재
LanguageData.CultChild3.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a powerful cult which shunned advanced technology and believed that all illness could be cured by cleansing the soul through sacred art.\n\nAfter [PAWN_possessive] first glimpse of the outside world, [PAWN_pronoun] decided to run away.
LanguageData.CultChild3.title: 사이비 아이
LanguageData.FrightenedChild43.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up with a laundry list of phobias and neuroses. [PAWN_pronoun] feared, among other things, doctors and foodborne pathogens.\n\nAs a result, [PAWN_pronoun] learned to cook and care for [PAWN_objective]self, but many of [PAWN_possessive] fears dog [PAWN_objective] in adulthood.
LanguageData.FrightenedChild43.title: 겁먹은 아이
LanguageData.MedicalAssistant12.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born during a catastrophic war in which both sides used incendiary weapons. [PAWN_pronoun] grew up helping [PAWN_possessive] parents in an infirmary, treating the cascade of horrific burns from the battlefields. [PAWN_pronoun] was left with a lifelong fear of fire.
LanguageData.MedicalAssistant12.title: 의학 조수
LanguageData.MusicalKid86.baseDesc: As a child, [PAWN_nameDef] had a talent for playing musical instruments and singing. [PAWN_pronoun] was given expert training and loved to perform in recitals and concerts, though the lavish praise [PAWN_pronoun] received made [PAWN_objective] a little self-obsessed.
LanguageData.MusicalKid86.title: 음악 아이
LanguageData.Mute34.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was greatly affected by a traumatic event early in [PAWN_possessive] life. For many years [PAWN_pronoun] refused to speak to people, preferring instead to play with [PAWN_possessive] household's numerous pets.
LanguageData.Mute34.title: 벙어리
LanguageData.OrganFarm67.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised in an illegal underground organ farm. [PAWN_possessive] body was used to grow organic implants for wounded mercenaries. Though [PAWN_possessive] upbringing has left [PAWN_objective] haunted, it has also given [PAWN_objective] a unique understanding of human biology.
LanguageData.OrganFarm67.title: 장기 농장
LanguageData.Pyromaniac18.baseDesc: From an early age, [PAWN_nameDef] had an unhealthy fascination with fire. [PAWN_pronoun] would set refuse heaps ablaze and become so entranced by the flames [PAWN_pronoun] would absent-mindedly burn [PAWN_objective]self.\n\nOne day while playing with matches, [PAWN_pronoun] carelessly burned down [PAWN_possessive] home.
LanguageData.Pyromaniac18.title: 방화광
LanguageData.ShopKid36.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s mother was often ill, and it fell to [PAWN_objective] to run the store which was their only source of income. [PAWN_pronoun] learned a little about the exotic artifacts which [PAWN_pronoun] sold, and a lot about the art of the deal.
LanguageData.ShopKid36.title: 어린 점주
LanguageData.SicklyChild55.baseDesc: As a child, [PAWN_nameDef] suffered from a rare disease. Quarantined in a hospital, [PAWN_pronoun] had minimal human contact and got little physical exercise. In the sterile hospital environment, however, [PAWN_pronoun] became very familiar with science and medicine.
LanguageData.SicklyChild55.title: 병약한 아이
LanguageData.StoryWriter67.baseDesc: As a child, [PAWN_nameDef] was addicted to reading. [PAWN_pronoun] would spend all day in [PAWN_possessive] local library with [PAWN_possessive] nose in a book. When budget cuts forced the library to close, [PAWN_nameDef] was distraught. [PAWN_pronoun] decided to fill the gap by writing [PAWN_possessive] own stories instead.
LanguageData.StoryWriter67.title: 소설가
LanguageData.VatgrownSoldier8.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't made as a person, but as an instrument of destruction. Grown in a bioweapons facility and taught combat during [PAWN_possessive] accelerated growth, [PAWN_nameDef] still has a proclivity for combat of all kinds and an aversion to human contact.
LanguageData.VatgrownSoldier8.title: 인공배양 군인
LanguageData.WarRefugee51.baseDesc: War broke out in [PAWN_nameDef]'s home when [PAWN_pronoun] was a baby. [PAWN_possessive] parents fled with [PAWN_objective], seeking safety wherever they could find it. [PAWN_nameDef]'s earliest memories are of being taught how to defend [PAWN_objective]self.\n\nThe violence and destruction [PAWN_pronoun] witnessed left [PAWN_objective] scarred for life.
LanguageData.WarRefugee51.title: 전쟁 난민
